A user can create his or her own installation of BartPE using the [[Installation (computer programs)|installation disk]] of the operating system in question and the [[Computer program|program]] PE Builder, programmed by [[Bart Lagerweij]].

A user can create his or her own installation of BartPE using the [[Installation (computer programs)|installation disk]] of the operating system in question and the [[Computer program|program]] PE Builder, programmed by Bart Lagerweij.
'''PE Builder''' is the software used to create the BartPE Live CDs.
'''PE Builder''' is the software used to create the BartPE Live CDs.
